Interface com.polk.utils.Component_Interface

public interface Component_Interface
When a class extends this interface, it is required to suppy a component with interface elements that apply to itself. Then it will be given a chance to poll the component, storing off any data and doing data validation.

confirm_ui()
The ui is complete, now poll ui to fill in object specific data.
proxy()
Gets a proxy to the user interface for this object.

proxy 
 public abstract Component proxy()
Gets a proxy to the user interface for this object.

confirm_ui 
 public abstract Identity confirm_ui()
The ui is complete, now poll ui to fill in object specific data. Return a key to the object, suitable for hashing. Returns null if there is data validation error.
